Blog.post: Good Day, I am Omega A fan of the electronics industry,in particular its entertianment uses.I am a humble gamer from the town of Athens AL. I am an avid D&D enthusiast and love Quake 3 and Warcraft 3. I am not a member of any Quake teams but am on the Market.I enjoy RPG video Games and Action Game(First Person Shooters).I also enjoy Rock n Roll music as well as Anime. Well thats about it ill see you later. Fare thee Well, Omega

Hello im back. time for some updateshere.I will begin reviewing some my favorite games this week.starting today with... Final Fantasy 7. FF7-pros-Great storyline and materia system.despite what some people say (Zach & Shannon) it actually is a good game but thats just there opinion... cons-poor graphics. No seriously thats it Well i would have to give it a 10/10. well i guess ill see ypu later bye

Hi im back. i was on a church trip to Cadiz KY. it was fun.any way a happy fathers day to yall.Oh yeah... Im on a Quake team!!! with my friends Justin Goldsmith, D.J. Maxwell and Nick Johnson! Well tyhats it no new news today see ya tomorrow Ps. What do Alabama fans and flies have in common? send your answers to: MetalgearFan04@yahoo.com
hey i got the word about GTA SA (Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas)!!! yes it is comin out nov.19 sorry though there is no more word about MGS3 orhalo but i tend to find out. Bye!!!

Well its high time we did a comparison os the newest handheld the PSP and the Nintendo DS. DS pros-Two screens, touch screen, GCN connectivity. cons- too big if you ask me ... also no Mp3s... PSP pros- Great graphics (as with the DS) Mp3s, and i hink theres a rumor of DVD capabilities AND a Metal Gear Solid Game for PSP!!!! cons- Well not much other than Sony's ability to screw you over when you by it as soon as it comes out. Well thats about it i guess ill see you later.

Hey Folks it's me again Omega.im just chillin after some sleep and Havent got around to doin anything. I have great news from the people at EGM.The people who brought "Viewtiful Joe" are going to Put in on PS2!!! But that aint Half of it they are going to release Viewtiful Joe 2 for GCN as well as PS2 isnt that awesome? anyway you can get more info from www.1up.com if you need it as for me im out see ya later!
